review:
Recently visited the clinic and had appointment with Dr. Sneha regarding  pain in the tooth and stains. 

Doctor: The Doctor was spot on in the diagnosis and felt that she was very knowledgeable and makes the patient feel very comfortable.

Clinic: The clinic is very spacious and ambient and is conveniently located with good parking space in a less noisy area. The equipments were modern with state of the art facilities. 
Treatment: I was treated for cavities in my tooth and the fillings were of best quality. I was treated with good care and professionalism. My teeth have become whiter than before and all stains removed. 
Worth the visit and definitely recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had visited Dentis Vita Dental Care for teeth fillings and laser gum surgery.  Dr. Sneha Nidhi provided a positive dental experience. The explanation of the procedure beforehand instilled confidence and led to a smooth and painless treatment.
